attributes.action: Make possession of child sex dolls illegal
attributes.additional_details: Some research suggests that owning a child sex doll could lead to an escalation of child sexual offending.
attributes.background: I want the UK Government to pass legislation which makes possession of child sex dolls illegal. It is currently illegal to ship them into the UK, however it isn't illegal to own one. They can be hyper-realistic, child-sized dolls.

departments.name: Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy
